channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Philanthropist MacKenzie Scott gave $7.1B to nonprofits in 2025, a major increase
item.description: The author and philanthropist MacKenzie Scott revealed $7.1 billion in donations to nonprofits in 2025 Tuesday, marking a significant increase in her ...

item.title: San Diego officials approve $30M settlement for family of teen killed by police
item.description: The San Diego City Council has approved a $30 million payment to the family of a 16-year-old killed by police

item.title: DOJ ends monitoring of illegal dumping in Houston in retreat from environmental justice
item.description: The U.S. Justice Department has withdrawn from an agreement with Houston to curb illegal dumping in Black and Latino neighborhoods

item.title: Assisted-living facility owner, inspector sue each other over faulty sprinklers

item.title: FBI adds true crime TV producer to Most Wanted list over phony heiress fraud
